languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Даргонус молит о помощи. В нескольких ульях мира вспыхнули волнения, связанные с трактовкой священных писаний. Выявляя агентуру Последнего восхода, Экклезиархия с особым тщанием принялась бороться с малыми культами и насаждать верный образ следования Кредо. Чернь ропщет против притеснений, которым подверглись церкви-минориты, и смеет утверждать, что святые пастыри присвоили себе право говорить за Бога-Императора".

"Dargonus is crying out for aid, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy clamped down on the planet's minor cults, attempting to force correct adherence to the Creed upon the populace. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Даргонус молит о помощи. В нескольких ульях мира вспыхнули волнения, связанные с трактовкой священных писаний. Выявляя агентуру Последнего восхода, Экклезиархия с особым тщанием принялась бороться с малыми культами и насаждать верный образ следования Кредо. traits.locale_text: "Dargonus is crying for help, Lord Captain. The riots over the interpretation of the scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy had started to fight the minor cults and trying to make them follow the right way of following the Creed. The commoners are murmuring against the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy pastors have assumed the right to speak for the God-Emperor completely for themselves."

"Dargonus cries for help, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy began reining in the minor cults, attempting to force upon them the correct adherence to the Creed. The commoners whisper of oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy pastors have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

languages.text: “达戈努斯在呼救，舰长大人。首都世界各地的多个巢都爆发了关于圣典解读的骚乱。国教成员在追捕终末黎明邪教的特工时，开始整合那些小型教派，试图强迫他们遵守正确的信条。所有平民私下里都在讨论那些小型教派遭受的压迫。他们甚至还说，那些小型教派的牧师才是神皇唯一的代言人。”
languages.original_text: "Dargonus cries for help, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy began reining in the minor cults, attempting to force upon them the correct adherence to the Creed. The commoners whisper of oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy pastors have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “达戈努斯在呼救，舰长大人。首都世界各地的多个巢都爆发了关于圣典解读的骚乱。国教成员在追捕终末黎明邪教的特工时，开始整合那些小型教派，试图强迫他们遵守正确的信条。所有平民私下里都在讨论那些小型教派遭受的压迫。他们甚至还说，那些小型教派的牧师才是神皇唯一的代言人。”

languages.text: «Dargonus pide ayuda, Lord Capitán. Han estallado disturbios por la interpretación de las escrituras en varias colmenas de todo el mundo. Mientras perseguía a los agentes del Culto del Amanecer Final, la Eclesiarquía comenzó a reinar sobre los cultos menores, intentando imponerles la correcta adhesión al Credo. Los plebeyos hablan de la opresión de los cultos menores, e incluso se atreven a afirmar que los santos pastores se han arrogado el derecho exclusivo de hablar en nombre del Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Dargonus cries for help, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy began reining in the minor cults, attempting to force upon them the correct adherence to the Creed. The commoners whisper of oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy pastors have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Dargonus pide ayuda, Lord Capitán. Han estallado disturbios por la interpretación de las escrituras en varias colmenas de todo el mundo. Mientras perseguía a los agentes del Culto del Amanecer Final, la Eclesiarquía comenzó a reinar sobre los cultos menores, intentando imponerles la correcta adhesión al Credo. Los plebeyos hablan de la opresión de los cultos menores, e incluso se atreven a afirmar que los santos pastores se han arrogado el derecho exclusivo de hablar en nombre del Dios Emperador».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスは助けを求めている。聖典の解釈をめぐる暴動が、惑星中のいくつかのハイヴで勃発している。最後の夜明け魔女団の諜報員を捜索している間に、帝国聖教会は少数派の魔女団を支配し始め、彼らに信条への忠誠を強要しようとした。庶民たちは、少数派の魔女団に対する弾圧をささやき、聖なる司祭たちが神帝陛下の代弁者としての権利を独り占めしていると主張するようにまでなっている」
languages.original_text: "Dargonus cries for help, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy began reigning in the minor cults, attempting to force upon them the correct adherence to the Creed. The commoners whisper of oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy pastors have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスは助けを求めている。聖典の解釈をめぐる暴動が、惑星中のいくつかのハイヴで勃発している。最後の夜明け魔女団の諜報員を捜索している間に、帝国聖教会は少数派の魔女団を支配し始め、彼らに信条への忠誠を強要しようとした。庶民たちは、少数派の魔女団に対する弾圧をささやき、聖なる司祭たちが神帝陛下の代弁者としての権利を独り占めしていると主張するようにまでなっている」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, Dargonus nous appelle à l'aide ! Des émeutes ont éclaté dans plusieurs ruches du monde, suite à l'interprétation des écritures. Tout en pourchassant les agents du Culte de l'Aube finale, l'Ecclésiarchie a commencé à mettre au pas les cultes mineurs, dans l'espoir de leur inculquer de force le respect du Crédo. Le petit peuple murmure que des cultes mineurs sont opprimées et va même jusqu'à prétendre que les saints pasteurs s'octroient à eux seuls le droit de parler au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu. »
languages.original_text: "Dargonus cries for help, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. While hunting for the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the Ecclesiarchy began reigning in the minor cults, attempting to force upon them the correct adherence to the Creed. The commoners whisper of oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy pastors have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."

Tout en pourchassant les agents du Culte de l'Aube finale, l'Ecclésiarchie a commencé à mettre au pas les cultes mineurs, dans l'espoir de leur inculquer de force le respect du Crédo. Le petit peuple murmure que des cultes mineurs sont opprimées et va même jusqu'à prétendre que les saints pasteurs s'octroient à eux seuls le droit de parler au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu. »

languages.text: "Dargonus ruft verzweifelt um Hilfe, Lord Captain. Es ist in verschiedenen Makropolen auf der gesamten Welt zu gewalttätigen Auseinandersetzung wegen der Deutung der heiligen Schriften gekommen. Während ihrer Jagd auf die Agenten des Kults der letzten Dämmerung hat die Ekklesiarchie auch die kleineren Kulte ins Visier genommen und versucht, sie zur Einhaltung des imperialen Glaubens zu zwingen. Der Pöbel sieht darin eine tyrannische Unterdrückung der kleinen Kulte und sagt, die heiligen Pastoren würden das alleinige Recht für sich beanspruchen, für den Gottimperator zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus cries for help, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. languages.text: "Dargonus'tan yardım çığlıkları yükseliyor Lord Kaptan. Dünya üzerindeki birçok kovanda yazıtların yorumlanması üzerine isyanlar patlak vermiş. Ekleşiarşi, bir yandan Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın ajanlarını avlarken ufak çaplı tarikatlara da aman vermemeye başlamış. Halkı İtikat'a hakiki bir şekilde sadakat göstermeye zorlamaya çalışıyorlar. Sıradan yurttaşların homurtularında ufak çaplı tarikatların baskıları duyuluyor. Hatta kutsal ekleşiarkların Tanrı İmparator adına konuşma haklarını üstlendiklerini iddia edecek kadar cüretkârlar."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is crying out for aid, Lord Captain. Riots over the interpretation of scripture have broken out in several hives across the world. The commoners grumble about the oppression of the minor cults, even daring to claim that the holy ecclesiarchs have assumed the sole right to speak for the God-Emperor."
